means: 欧洲酸樱桃（野生樱桃的一种）

sentence.Network_en: It offers an intense aroma with strong green pepper, fruity like cherry and marasca.
sentence.Network_cn: 散发出浓郁香气,蕴含强烈的绿胡椒与欧洲酸樱桃的混合香气.

sentence.Network_en: A cordial made from the fermented juice and crushed pits of the marasca cherry.
sentence.Network_cn: 经苦的野生欧洲酸樱桃的汁液发酵后蒸馏制成的酒.

sentence.Network_en: Bouquet and taste intense vinous scent with notes of marasca cherry, violets and soft fruit.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒香及口感:有着宜人的花香及成熟果实的芳香,樱桃等水果的芳香.口感清爽 、 悦人,口感丰富.

marao 马朗, marasca 马拉斯卡, marasa 马拉萨

means.word_mean: 1. small bitter fruit of the marasca cherry tree from whose juice maraschino liqueur is made
2. Dalmatian bitter wild cherry tree bearing fruit whose juice is made into maraschino liqueur
